name: World Map Passport Holder
description:
In aid of your holiday preparations we have made up some World Map Passport Holders to help you remember all your important documents! Also great for revising your world geography and planning your trip ahead.

Holder measures 14cm x 10cm closed (14cm x 20cm open) and includes two sleeve pockets inside to hold passport, ticket and boarding card..

Visit our home website to see our full range available: www.sewsmitten.com

Also please do email us for international shipping costs as prices will vary depending on the country.

name: Retro Sweets Cardholder
description:
We've gone sweetie crazy here at Smitten HQ! So join in the indulgence and take yourself home one of our sweetie cardholders! 

They are the ideal accessory; useful for holding your bus/oyster cards, student ID's and even bank cards! 

Holder measures 9.5cm x 7cm closed (19cm x 7cm open) includes two slots and can hold up to four cards comfortably!

More styles available on our home website: www.sewsmitten.com

Also please do email us for international shipping costs as prices will vary depending on the country.

name: Rocket-lips & Raygun-driers Cosmetic Bag
description:
This makeup/purse is handmade, silk screen printed and designed by us at SewSmitten HQ. 

Inspired by a 50's theme it features a rocket lipstick and raygun hairdrier. 

Turquoise option: The outer fabric is made from a turquoise cotton drill and the lining is a black & white striped cotton. 

Pink option: The outer fabric is made from a pink linen and the lining is a patterned cotton

Canvas option: The outer fabric is made from a cream canvas cotton and the lining is a green stripe patterned cotton. 

It measures approx.20cm x 13cm and is perfect for holding all your makeup essentials.

Lining pattern may vary according to what we have in stock.

Extra info: This design also appears in a book - 'Textiles Now' by Drusilla Cole published by Laurence King Publishing.

Visit our home website to see our other designs available: www.sewsmitten.com

Also please do email us for international shipping costs as prices will vary depending on the country.

name: WWII/Cult Cinema themed Greeting Cards
description:
This is a reproduction of a Three Colour Reduction Block Lino Print By Luke Kulchstein © 2008 (1 of a set of 6 prints)

Printed in London on 100% Recycled Textured Card

Card is 10.5 cm x 15 cm, is blank inside and comes wrapped in a cellophane bag with a brown kraft paper envelope 

Visit our home website for our full set of cards available: www.sewsmitten.com

Also please do email us for international shipping costs as prices will vary depending on the country.

options.name: Do You Want a Cup of Tea?

name: WWII/Cult Cinema themed Teatowels
description:
Brightened up your kitchen and own one of these great looking tea towels with original artwork! Or why not give one to someone, its the ideal unique gift! 

100% White Cotton Tea towel, silk screen printed by us! Featuring a design which is a reproduction of a Three Colour Reduction Block Lino Print By Luke Kulchstein © 2008 aka Gnome. 

The weave of the towel makes it super-absorbent and it is hemmed on all four sides. Also includes a handy hanging loop.

Size is approx. 46cm (w) x 74cm (h)

Visit our home website for our matching aprons we have available: www.sewsmitten.com

Also please do email us for international shipping costs as prices will vary depending on the country.
